Instruction: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Add chilled butter and mix until the consistency is crumbly.
Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface and knead until it becomes smooth and elastic.

Roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/8 inch and cut it into 8-inch rounds. Brush the rounds with the remaining 3 tablespoons of melted butter. Fold each round in half, then fold it in half again to create triangles. Press down firmly to seal the layers and arrange on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until they are golden brown, approximately 15 minutes. Serve warm.
